Sampler for LFM with CPP subordinator

rmo_lfm_cpp.Rd

Sampler for LFM with CPP subordinator

rmo_lfm_cpp(n, d, rate, rate_killing, rate_drift, rjump_name, rjump_arg_list)

Arguments

n

number of samples
d

dimension
rate

rate of CPP subordinator
rate_killing

killing rate of CPP subordinator
rate_drift

drift rate of CPP subordinator
rjump_name

name of jump sampling function
rjump_arg_list

list with named arguments for jump sampling function

Value

An n x d array with n independent samples of the corresponding d variate extendible Marshall-Olkin distribution.

Examples

rmo_lfm_cpp(10L, 2L, 0.5, 0, 0, "rposval", list("value"=1))
#>            [,1]       [,2]
#>  [1,] 1.1955130 1.02416435
#>  [2,] 3.1083162 0.55074221
#>  [3,] 2.9470626 2.94706256
#>  [4,] 0.1302607 0.13026066
#>  [5,] 2.4930924 6.78621471
#>  [6,] 2.4830646 2.48306458
#>  [7,] 4.4297558 4.42975581
#>  [8,] 1.6691409 1.66914090
#>  [9,] 8.6360952 0.04978157
#> [10,] 4.5293321 4.33496630
rmo_lfm_cpp(10L, 2L, 0.5, 0, 0, "rexp", list("rate"=2))
#>              [,1]       [,2]
#>  [1,]  1.69363058  1.6936306
#>  [2,]  8.74893014  8.7489301
#>  [3,] 14.85849052  3.3625388
#>  [4,]  0.06506575 20.3856509
#>  [5,]  3.66914291  3.6691429
#>  [6,]  9.46858572  6.0037359
#>  [7,]  5.18804869  1.3766536
#>  [8,]  1.97287526  0.1197391
#>  [9,]  2.14800981  2.1480098
#> [10,] 12.66381257  1.4623702
